title: 10 kill shaco loses 1v1 to a 4 kill gragas explain that to me forums?
body: i wouldnt be mad if shaco could actually assassanate squishes, but he cant. So explain that one to me???

You're the kind of Shaco player I like.  You don't know ~~how to kill me~~ how to play your champion.  Otherwise I absolutely hate Shaco players.  The good ones are ALL pure evil.

as shaco you should try to kill and fight a cc tank that isnt what you are designed to do you should be killing lux mid over and over and make her useless or focus the adc but gragas is a tank with cc and high damage and heals when he drinks from his barrel a went 

{{item:3742}} {{item:3025}} {{item:1414}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3211}} {{item:3068}} how do you think you are gonna kill him at any point unless he is below 1/3 hp and all cds are used ?

Glass cannon means anything can shatter you. 

Should have built an HP+AD item or Maw.
